dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3228 IH: Free Press Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Himes introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To require the President to provide frequent press briefings covering the official business of the President to the White House press corps.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Free Press Act of 2017.
The President shall provide for video recorded press briefings covering the official business of the President to the White House press corps not less than 2 times per week.
